I feel like: I really liked this movie\, the first time I went and see it\, the second I started to think about it\, it really dissapointed me\, there were a million of ways to make this movie perfect\, but they went and made it really bad\, and everything because of the script\, this was lazy writing all over\, they had an agenda and pushed it with lazyness and this is why this movie shall be remembered as one of the worst starwars movies of all times\, but still is a decent\, entreteingint flick.
